attributes.action: look after working class person not just the rich
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why do the banks get bailed out when thousands of working class people in the building trade lose there jobs why havent we had any help labour is suppose to be the party of the working class i petition gordon brown to prove me wrong or is he just looking after hes self as all politions do.

rejection.details: Request in title is not specific enough. No particular action called for.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
